xdi2.core.features.nodetypes

Class XdiAttributeSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAbstractContext<EQ>
      • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAbstractSubGraph<XdiAttribute>
        • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAbstractAttribute
          • xdi2.core.features.nodetypes.XdiAttributeSingleton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<XdiContext<?>>, XdiAttribute, XdiContext<XdiAttribute>, XdiSingleton<XdiAttribute>, XdiSubGraph<XdiAttribute>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XdiAttributeSingleton.Definition, XdiAttributeSingleton.Variable

    public class XdiAttributeSingleton
extends XdiAbstractAttribute
implements XdiSingleton<XdiAttribute>, XdiAttribute
    An XDI attribute singleton, represented as a context node.
    Author:
    markus
